verbs.description: [ARG0: An angry Chris Matthews] [V: ended] [ARG1: Wednesday ’s Hardball] [ARGM-MNR: by going on a “ Trump Watch ” diatribe about how he really wanted a verdict in the Trump - Russia probe] . Of course , the only outcome he seemed to consider for a verdict was President Trump ’s guilt . And bizarrely enough , Matthews admitted his “ passion ” for a verdict was driven by his recent viewing of a fictitious television series
